title: Universe 1 (Silverberg anthology)
text:
Universe 1 is an <a href="anthology">anthology</a> of original <a href="science%20fiction">science fiction</a> short stories edited by American writers <a href="Robert%20Silverberg">Robert Silverberg</a> and <a href="Karen%20Haber">Karen Haber</a>, the first volume in a <a href="Universe%20%28anthology%20series%29">series</a> of three, continuing an earlier series of the same name edited by <a href="Terry%20Carr">Terry Carr</a>. It was first published in hardcover and trade paperback by <a href="Doubleday%20%28publisher%29">Doubleday Foundation</a> in June 1990. A standard paperback edition was issued by <a href="Bantam%20Spectra">Bantam Spectra</a> in April 1991.
The book collects twenty novelettes and short stories by various science fiction authors, together with an introduction by Silverberg.
Awards.
The anthology placed fourth in the 1991 <a href="Locus%20Award">Locus Poll Award for Best Anthology</a>.
"The Shobies' Story" was nominated for the 1991 <a href="Nebula%20Award%20for%20Best%20Novelette">Nebula Award for Best Novelette</a> and placed third in the 1991 <a href="Locus%20Award%20for%20Best%20Novelette">Locus Poll Award for Best Novelette</a>.
"The Shores of Bohemia" placed eleventh in the 1991 <a href="Locus%20Award%20for%20Best%20Novelette">Locus Poll Award for Best Novelette</a>.
